title: Cant contact riot support, wont allow me to open support link.
body:
i have had issue s with riot, i was in the middle of a ranked game, when suddenly i dc, i try re launching nothing, then i restart my pc, relaunch league , it says "We have restored this installation to an older version of LoL. Now we'll try to patch.." and it was stuck there, tried to switch regions to force patch league crashes, tried this a couple more times, and nothing, finally iam fed up with this, so i uninstall league in hopes of reinstalling a functioning version,now it is saying failed to connect to http server may not be connected to internet, but i am, otherwise i wouldnt be able to post this. 
please help,

replies.body: I have had the same problem for the past 4 days. And i also cant even get connection to Riot support for some reason. so i can't even write a ticket...

Hmmmm yea it sounds like the main issue here is that your network is having an incredibly hard time getting a solid connection between you and our servers. Take some quick basic troubleshooting steps by following the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and pay close attention to the steps on port forwarding and DNS settings. 

If you're trying to open a support ticket, you should be able to with this link -> [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
